fields.name: <dice>
fields.value: Returns a random value from each die from 1-6, and displays the total for the dice.

fields.name: d<sides>
fields.value: Returns a random value from each dice from 1 to the number of sides selected.

fields.name: <dice> <sides>
fields.value: Returns a random value from each die from 1 to the number of sides selected, and displays the total for the dice.
